content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_fence
inventory=[{"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a spruce_fence, I first need to craft spruce_planks, which requires placing a stripped_spruce_log in the crafting grid. Since there is a stripped_spruce_log at slot 31, I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_fence
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the spruce_planks, I will move them from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_fence
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have the spruce_planks, I can craft the spruce_fence. To do so, I need to place 3 spruce_planks in the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 spruce_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_fence
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that I have placed 1 spruce_plank in the crafting grid, I need to place 2 more. Since there is a stick at slot 15, I will move it to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 12, "index": 12}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "salmon_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 33, "index": 30}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "warped_wart_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 40}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
